post.author: MNeMiC
post.body:
Teleporters are always good to use in science-fiction games. They are useable for both single-player and for multi-player. They are really simple to create aswell.

http://www.mnemic.tk/education/videotut ... o_tscc.rar

Size:3.61Mb
Length:1:22 Minutes

post.author: manic
post.body:
Hi there,

I'm desperately looking for a way to make elevators and simply to use platforms. The tutorials are not playable with microsoft, nor with quicktime. How do I fix that?

post.author: MNeMiC
post.body:
Oh, but they are =)
you just need a CODEC (codec are like, drivers for videos and movies)..



http://www.techsmith.com/products/studi ... wnload.asp

there's the one you will need, it's free and very very tiny.

http://www.mnemic.tk has one on platforms, http://www.modsonline.com has 2 on platforms and one on complicated elevators.
